publ: by 天津华来科技有限公司
name: Ailofy
0:
”Alexa, turn on the couch light”
”Alexa, turn on the light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can control your smart Ailofy Devices from any Alexa enabled device by saying "Alexa, turn on the light". The skill is also allowing you to change the brightness and temperature of light. In a similar manner, you can interact with the light strip or light bulb by saying "Alexa, turn on the light", where light would be the name of the light strip or light bulb. 

Before you get started, please make sure your Ailofy devices is online and updated to the latest firmware. Then enable the Ailofy Skill in Alexa app or ask Alexa to enable the skill by saying "Alexa, enable the Ailofy Skill" and you will be directed to link your Ailofy account with your Alexa account.

Some example commands are:

"Alexa, open my bathroom light."

Note: The current support of the Lock does not reflect the status of the door (opened or closed)

Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices:

Echo Show
Echo Spot
FireTV Stick Gen 2
FireTV Gen 2
FireTV 4K Gen 3
FireTV Cube
Fire Tablet 7 or higher

Notes: 
FireTV Gen 1 - Support time to be updated
FireTV Stick Gen 1 - Not supported
